3.title: Apeiron.two.k.sea
3.author: Anonymous
3.description: A new look for the new mellinium. Alternate sprites, titles, and sounds make this classic game look new again.

8.title: Star Trek Apeiron.sea
8.author: Anonymous
8.description: Star Trek like youve never seen it before. Complete makeover in sight and music and much different sound! Youll love ST TNG Apeiron if you like Star Trek or not...it is still fun and gives a new feeling. Complete installation instructions included.

5.title: Gory Sprites.sit
5.author: Anonymous
5.description: Alternate sprites file for Apeiron. Some of the graphics were retouched by an unknown author to make them a bit more... gory. All the other graphics were untouched.

9.title: Star Wars.sit
9.author: Anonymous
9.description: Star Wars for Apeiron! Alternate sprites, sounds, and titles for Apeiron. These files give Apeiron a Star Wars theme, complete with new sounds and some new graphics. Instructions to install the files is included. ResEdit is not required to play Star Wars for Apeiron.

4.title: End Screen.sit
4.author: Anonymous
4.description: This is a new game over screen where Cheech doesnt enjoy his pipe like he used to.

7.title: Simpson Apeiron.sea
7.author: Anonymous
7.description: Shoot down members of the Simpson Family, watch Krusty the Clown fly around the screen, and Blinky the three-eyed fish poisons the heads you shoot!

6.title: Muppet Sprites.sea
6.author: Anonymous
6.description: Alternate sprites file for Apeiron. Just what you have always wanted. Blow up Bert! Eliminate Ernie! Kill Kermit! ResEdit is required to install these sprites - instructions included.
